import check from './check.png' import edit from './draw.png' import pause from './pause.png' import play from './play-button-arrowhead.png' import trash from './trash-bin.png' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import EditCoinInfo from './editCoin' const AdminPage = () => { const [coinsArr, setcoinsArr] = useState([]); const [ editCoin, setEditCoin ] = useState(false); const [isActive, setisActive] = useState(false); const [currId, setcurrId] = useState(''); const reviewBtnClick = () => { setisActive(true); setcurrId() } useEffect( () => { axios.get('https://coinscore-cc-backend.onrender.com/api/collections/coins/allcoin') .then(data => setcoinsArr(data.data.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) const reviewedArr = (coinsArr.filter((item) => item.isReviewed)) const deactivatedArr = (coinsArr.filter((item) => !(item.isActive))) return(

Admin Panel

CRUD for crypto coin Database!

Review Coins

{ coinsArr.map(coin =>

{coin.coinName}

{coin.coinAcro}

) }

Deactivated Coins

{ deactivatedArr.map(coin =>

{coin.coinName}

{coin.coinAcro}

) }

Edit Coins

{ reviewedArr.map(coin =>

{coin.coinName}

{coin.coinAcro}

) }
); } export default AdminPage;
